model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the board of the chess game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check(Piece.Color color)
      Is it check? Returns information if the chosen king(by color) can be killed by any other piece on the board
      boolean checkMate(Piece.Color color)
      Is it CheckMate? Returns information if pieces in any chosen color can do any move if not it's CheckMate
      void clearBoard()
      Delete all pieces from the board
      Piece getPiece(int position)
      Returns the piece from the board on the chosen position
      java.util.ArrayList<Piece> getPieces()
      Returns the list of all pieces on the board
      boolean makeMove(Piece piece, int toPosition)
      Moves selected piece to the selected position
      boolean makeMove(Piece piece, int toPosition, boolean undoMode, boolean checkAvailableMoves)
      Moves selected piece to the selected position
      void printBoardConsole()
      Deprecated. 
      Used only for debug purposes
      void putPiecesOnBoard()
      Delete all pieces from the board and put new Pieces in default starting positions
      void undoMove()
      Undo the last move made, if there is no movement in the history it's do nothing

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove(Piece piece,
                        int toPosition)
        Moves selected piece to the selected position
        Parameters:
        piece - Piece to be moved
        toPosition - Position where the piece should be moved
        Returns:
        If the move was made successfully

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove(Piece piece,
                        int toPosition,
                        boolean undoMode,
                        boolean checkAvailableMoves)
        Moves selected piece to the selected position
        Parameters:
        piece - Piece to be moved
        toPosition - Position where the piece should be moved
        undoMode - Marks if a move is a try of undoing the move that is already made
        checkAvailableMoves - Marks if the method should check if king is vulnerable to attack after this move
        Returns:
        If the move was made successfully

      • undoMove

        public void undoMove()
        Undo the last move made, if there is no movement in the history it's do nothing

      • check

        public boolean check(Piece.Color color)
        Is it check? Returns information if the chosen king(by color) can be killed by any other piece on the board
        Parameters:
        color - Color of the king that is being checked
        Returns:
        If if the chosen king is vulnerable to attack from another piece

      • checkMate

        public boolean checkMate(Piece.Color color)
        Is it CheckMate? Returns information if pieces in any chosen color can do any move if not it's CheckMate
        Parameters:
        color - color
        Returns:
        If is checkMate or not
